content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) with a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) feeding it iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-12.0, -48.0) with a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) feeding it iron ore.
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) receiving iron plates from the burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5).
- Transport belt group connecting the furnaces to the wooden chest.

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (-3.5, 23.5).
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5).
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5).
- Pipe group connecting the offshore pump to the boiler.
- Electricity group with poles distributed across various positions for power distribution.

### Iron Plate Transport System
Consists of:
- Belt group transporting iron plates from position (-11.5, -46.5) to position (-9.5, -46.5).
- Belt group transporting items from position (-12.5, -44.5) to position (-11.5, -46.5).

### Storage and Inserter System
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -44.5) storing iron plates.
- Iron chest at position (-11.5, -44.5).
- Multiple burner inserters positioned at (-13.5, -45.5), (-11.5, -45.5), and (-9.5, -44.5) for item movement.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure the target entity contains the items you want to extract before attempting extraction. Verify the entity's inventory status.

### Errors when Inserting Items
- Confirm that you have the items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. Check your inventory to ensure you have the required items.

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement. Verify the tile is unoccupied.
